content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello, Yi-Nuo Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm a student, so I'm on a tight budget. I was wondering if you could offer me a discount because I'm a student?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I always aim to provide fair prices to all my tenants. However, I cannot offer discounts based on personal circumstances. The price for the apartment is fixed, and I'm sure it reflects the quality and location of the property. Would you like to make an offer based on the market value?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. Considering it's an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center, I think €500 a month is a fair price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but €500 is below the market value for an apartment of this quality and location. I can't accept that offer. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I understand. Let's split the difference. How about €600 a month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: €600 is closer to the market value, but still not quite there. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the high demand for apartments in this area. Would you be willing to go up to €750? This is a very competitive price for the amenities and location you'll be enjoying.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the consideration, Mister Schmidt. However, €750 is quite a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay €650, which is closer to the market value and more realistic for a student like me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: €650 is still lower than what I'm looking for. This apartment is brand new and in a prime location, which justifies a higher rent. I'm sure you understand that as a landlord, I need to cover my costs and make a reasonable profit. Would you be willing to go up to €700? This is a fair deal for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your fairness and understanding. I agree to the price of €700 Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad we could reach an agreement, Yi-Nuo. You'll find the apartment to be a great place to live, and I hope you enjoy your time there. Welcome to Duisburg! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
